name: Rocket Escape (Mokshith)
description:
Rocket Escape is a Puzzle-Platformer game where an astronaut needs to reach the rocket to escape. Hope you enjoy : D

Controlls: 

-->A and D to move Forward and Backward

-->W or Space to Jump

-->ESC to Pause

Credits:

-->3D models are made in blender by watching the tutorials made by Imphenzia (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzfWju7SFoWLCyV_gDVCrGA)

-->Particle effects from InfinityBladeEffects (UnrealMarketPlace)

-->Sound effects from https://freesound.org

Softwares Used;

-->Unreal Engine

-->Blender

-->Gimp
